name: Dog Chaser
description:
The crisp country air in your lungs, the sound of the trees rustling in the wind… its so nice that Mrs. Winkle’s dog has finally stopped pulling on his lead. If it didn’t pay so much to walk her dog then there is no way you would be wasting your time with this. Actually, why does she pay so much to walk her dog? She was very clear that you had to return the dog for your payment. But seriously...How hard could it be? What's the WORST that could happen?. Wait did it stop pulling its lead? Oh no… He’s gone!. In our 3D game, you are led on a wild goose (dog) chase which takes you all over your world and to places you've never seen before. Who thought such a simple mundane task could lead to such an epic chase. Try it for yourself today. 

Note:  If your browser doesn't perform well try the latest version of Google Chrome.
